dev/svr/common/basic_manager.h

00001 // File:        basic_manager.h
00002 // Description: ---
00003 // Notes:       ---
00004 // Author:      leoxiang <leoxiang727@qq.com>
00005 // Revision:    2015-06-15 by leoxiang
00006 
00007 #pragma once
00008 #include <unordered_map>
00009 #include "lsf/container/shared_mem.hpp"
00010 #include "svr/common/common_header.h"
00011 
00012 template<typename ElemType>
00013 class BasicManager : public lsf::basic::NonCopyable {
00014 public:
00015     using key_type = typename ElemType::key_type;
00016     using value_type = ElemType;
00017     using map_type = std::unordered_map<key_type,value_type>;
00018     using iterator = typename map_type::iterator;
00019     constexpr static const float DEF_MAX_LOAD_FACTOR = 0.8;
00020 
00021 public:
00023     // init mananger
00024     bool Init(key_t shm_key, size_t max_size) {
00025         // check input
00026         if (max_size == 0) {
00027             LSF_LOG_ERR_STACK("invalid input, %u", max_size);
00028             return false;
00029         }
00030 
00031         // save value
00032         _shm_key = shm_key;
00033         _max_size = max_size;
00034 
00035         // init hash
00036         _map.max_load_factor(DEF_MAX_LOAD_FACTOR);
00037         _map.reserve(max_size);
00038 
00039         // if find shm, then recover data
00040         if (_shm_key != 0 && lsf::container::SharedMem::IsShmExist(_shm_key)) {
00041             lsf::container::SharedMem shared_mem(_shm_key);
00042             uint8_t* pbase = (uint8_t*)shared_mem.GetPtr();
00043             size_t total = shared_mem.GetSize();
00044             size_t off = 0;
00045 
00046             // get total count
00047             size_t elem_size = 0;
00048             lsf::util::UnSerialize(pbase, total, off, elem_size);
00049 
00050             // recover every elem
00051             for (size_t i = 0; i < elem_size && i < max_size; ++i) {
00052                 // recover from buffer
00053                 value_type tmp;
00054                 if (!tmp.UnSerialize(pbase, total, off)) {
00055                     LSF_LOG_ERR_STACK("unserialize failed, count=%d, total=%u, %s", i, elem_size, LSF_PROTOBUF);
00056                     return false;
00057                 }
00058 
00059                 // insert into map
00060                 _map[tmp.GetKey()] = std::move(tmp);
00061                 _map[tmp.GetKey()].AfterUnSerialize();
00062 
00063             }
00064 
00065             // delete shm
00066             lsf::container::SharedMem::Delete(_shm_key);
00067         }
00068 
00069         // set status
00070         _is_init = true;
00071 
00072         return true;
00073     }
00074 
00076     // when manager released, serialize all data
00077     bool Release() {
00078         // just ignore empty shm key
00079         if (_shm_key == 0) return true;
00080 
00081         // if shm already exist, then delete it
00082         if (lsf::container::SharedMem::IsShmExist(_shm_key) && !lsf::container::SharedMem::Delete(_shm_key)) {
00083             LSF_LOG_ERR_STACK("delete shared mem failed, %s", LSF_SES());
00084             return false;
00085         }
00086 
00087         // count need byte size
00088         size_t byte_size = sizeof(size_t);
00089         for (auto const& elem : _map) {
00090             byte_size += elem.second.GetSize();
00091             byte_size += sizeof(size_t);
00092         }
00093 
00094         if (byte_size == 0) return true;
00095 
00096         // create shm mem
00097         if (!lsf::container::SharedMem::Create(_shm_key, byte_size)) {
00098             LSF_LOG_ERR_STACK("create shared mem failed, key=%x, byte_size=%u, %s", _shm_key, byte_size, LSF_SES());
00099             return false;
00100         }
00101         lsf::container::SharedMem shared_mem(_shm_key);
00102         if (!shared_mem.IsAttached()) {
00103             LSF_LOG_ERR_STACK("shared mem is not attached, key=%x", _shm_key);
00104             return false;
00105         }
00106         uint8_t* pbase = (uint8_t*)shared_mem.GetPtr();
00107         size_t total = shared_mem.GetSize();
00108         size_t off = 0;
00109 
00110         // serialize total count
00111         lsf::util::Serialize(pbase, total, off, (size_t)_map.size());
00112 
00113         // serialize every elem
00114         for (auto const& elem : _map) {
00115             if (!elem.second.Serialize(pbase, total, off)) {
00116                 LSF_LOG_ERR_STACK("serialize failed, total=%u, off=%u, %s", total, off, LSF_PROTOBUF);
00117                 LSF_LOG_ERR("\n%s", LSF_PTS(elem.second));
00118                 return false;
00119             }
00120         }
00121 
00122         return true;
00123     }
00124 
00125 public:
00126     bool IsInit() const { return _is_init; }
00127     value_type& operator[](key_type const& key) { return _map[key]; }
00128     void erase(key_type const& key) { _map.erase(key); }
00129     bool exist(key_type const& key) const { return _map.find(key) != _map.end(); }
00130     bool full() const { return _map.size() >= _max_size; }
00131     bool empty() const { return _map.empty(); }
00132     size_t size() const { return _map.size(); }
00133     size_t max_size() const { return _max_size; }
00134     iterator begin() { return _map.begin(); }
00135     iterator end() { return _map.end(); }
00136     iterator find(key_type const& key) { return _map.find(key); }
00137 
00138 private:
00139     bool _is_init = false;
00140     map_type _map;
00141     key_t _shm_key;
00142     size_t _max_size;
00143 };
00144 
00145 // vim:ts=4:sw=4:et:ft=cpp:
Generated on 25 Jan 2016 for lsf by  1.6.1
